DESCRIPTION: Sigils are unplayable cards whose effects trigger when they are discarded from your hand.
Activated relics do not have a passive effect.  They have an effect when their button is clicked.
Orb: Deals damage to a random enemy.  Ignores #yFocus.
At the end of your turn gain #yBlock. When receiving unblocked attack damage, reduce Plated Armor by 1.
Resonant cards are returned to the top of your draw pile at the end of your turn.  If you play multiple resonant cards in one turn, they merge into a single stronger card.
Whenever a creature with Frostbite attacks it takes damage and its Frostbite is reduced by 1.
Crushed creatures take more damage from attacks.
Whenever a Jinxed creature receives a debuff, it loses HP.
The first #yAttack each turn deals 25% extra damage per stack.
